meaningMnemonic: I'd like to <kanji>isolate</kanji> this <kanji>interval of time</kanji>. Take it, make it separate, and then look at it. Now there is a <vocabulary>space</vocabulary> there. An <vocabulary>interval</vocabulary>, if you will.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
